Spring flings
 Lloyd Carr's spring has been anything but bland so far.  (Getty Images)


    

      
      Russell Crowe. Water 
      fights. Reading lists. Star-studded reunions. Come fall, 
      Michigan football will be all about beating Ohio State and winning 
      titles, but Dennis Dodd says for now, it's time to recharge in 
      Ann Arbor.
    

  
Full story Related Links:• Michigan:  Alumni | Dodd: Mailbag | New blog | Top 5s | Hot Seat | Hey!• Bowls | Dodd previews:  Big 10 | Big 12 | Big East | Pac-10
  | SEC


 


 

 





 Goldstein: Senators goaltender Emery lost in the shuffle


    

      
      Ottawa's scoring is a problem -- that's clear. But goalieRay Emery's 
      play has kept the Sens 
      in two losses to the Ducks, giving his team hope it can turn the series 
      around.
    

  
• ANA 2, OTT 0 | Ducks look to wrap it up |  Game 2


 

 





 Porter makes noise, money and list of NFL's overrated


    

      
      Miami's $32M man, Joey Porter, is full of sound and fury, and you know 
      what that signifies, Pete Prisco says. As for underrated 
      players, let's praise the Patriots' Ty Warren.
    

  
• Warren mourns Hill | Reports | Photos | Schedule
